title: ENR Russia: l'offre de Valartis est valable du 24 octobre au 6 novembre
cleaned_sentences: Zurich (AWP) - The Zugois Valartis banking group published the prospectus of its takeover offer from the Geneva participation company Enr Russia on Wednesday.
The offer is valid from October 24 to November 6, 2024, subject to extension.
The price of the offer amounts to 5.60 Swiss francs per share ENR, of a nominal value of 12.40 Swiss francs each, Valartis said on Wednesday in a press release.
The public purchase offer should be finalized on December 10, 2024.
However, according to the offer prospectus published on Wednesday, the offer relates only to 41,668 actions ENR Russia, Valartis already holding almost all of ENR.
Valartis currently controls 98.38% of the Geneva company, against 97.9% at the time of pre -registration.
In August, Valartis sold its shares in Athris, another Zugoise participation company, and received in return 892,703 ENR titles as well as a cash payment.
In addition, a condition for the public purchase offer is that no court or authority makes a decision or an order which prevents, prohibits or declares the implementation of this offer inadmissible.
